entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:35 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 10:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 45 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: W 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
